ContourPlotHelper¶

ContourPlotHelper.plot_base_data(x_df, y_df, data_df, prop)¶
Parameters

  • x_df – A DataFrame containing the x values used by the contour plot

  • y_df – A DataFrame containing the y values used by the contour plot

  • data_df – A DataFrame containing the data values used by the contour plot

  • prop – The label of the property we will be making this plot for

Returns

Nothing

Plots the contour plot in the format of it being the original data gathered from an excel file.

ContourPlotHelper.plot_f(dh, prop, method='in each K Means Cluster')¶
Parameters

  • dh – The deconvolution helper used for analysis

  • prop – The property that we will use as a label

  • method – What method is being used

Returns

Nothing

Plots the fractions of data points that land in each decon phase

ContourPlotHelper.plot_final_decon_data(x_df, y_df, decon_results_df, prop, curr_m)¶
Parameters

  • x_df – A DataFrame containing the x values used by the contour plot

  • y_df – A DataFrame containing the y values used by the contour plot

  • decon_results_df – The results of the decon algorithm

  • prop – The label of the property we will be making this plot for

  • curr_m – The current number of phases in the decon method

Returns

Nothing

Plots the contour plot based on the results of the deconvolution algorithm

ContourPlotHelper.plot_final_k_means_data(x_df, y_df, k_means_results_df, prop, num_clusters)¶
Parameters

  • x_df – A DataFrame containing the x values used by the contour plot

  • y_df – A DataFrame containing the y values used by the contour plot

  • k_means_results_df – A DataFrame containing hte results of the K-Means Clustering algorithm

  • prop – The label of the property we will be making this plot for

  • num_clusters – The number of clusters in the K-Means Clustering algorithm

Returns

Nothing

Plots a contour plot of the results of the K-Means Clustering algorithm

ContourPlotHelper.plot_k_means_frac(cluster_means_arr, cluster_fractions, prop)¶
Parameters

  • cluster_means_arr – The means of the clusters

  • cluster_fractions – The fraction of data in each cluster

  • prop – The label to use in the plot’s labels

Returns

Nothing

Plots the fraction of data that lands in each cluster as a bar graph
